data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字

data.fullContent: It would seem that journal articles would be excellent sources of physical property data, and for standard data that are routinely reported, they are. The problem is that indexing of physical property data contained in journal articles is not always consistently done by the abstracting and indexing services. There are some journals that are specifically designed to publish data. Two of those are the Journal of Physical and Chemical Reference Data ( 1972- ) and the Journal of Chemical and Engineering Data ( 1956- ). These journals can be searched via the publishers' websites or using one of the indexes mentioned below.
data.answer: 看起来期刊文章是物理属性数据的极好来源，对于常规报告的标准数据来说，它们就是。问题是期刊文章中包含的物理属性数据的索引并不总是由抽象和索引服务一致地完成。有一些期刊是专门为发表数据而设计的。其中两份是《物理和化学参考数据杂志》(1972-)和《化学和工程数据杂志》(1956-)。这些期刊可以通过出版商的网站或使用下面提到的索引之一进行搜索。
